data.eml:eml: A new species of Eutardigrade (Macrobiotidae) from New Zealand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tumanov, Denis V., Pilato, Giovanni (2019): A new species of Eutardigrade (Macrobiotidae) from New Zealand. Zootaxa 4603 (3): 537-548, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4603.3.6
